bibl.bibl: Cuvier, Georges. 1859. The animal kingdom, arranged after its organisation â€¦ by the late Baron Georges Cuvier. Translated and adapted to the present state of science. Mammalia, birds, and reptiles by Edward Blyth. The fishes and radiata by Robert Mudie. The molluscous animals by George Johnston. The articulated animals by J. O. Westwood. A new edition with additions by W. B. Carpenter and J. O. Westwood. London and Edinburgh: A. Fullerton & Co. [Reprint of Cuvier 1849, with added plates.]
